entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangiqsualujjuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
